text: Learn how to talk about lunch (午饭) plans.If you have never tried Kung Pao Chicken (宫保鸡丁), I strongly recommend it. Delicious!小明：Xiao Hua, where will you go to eat lunch? 小花：To a restaurant! 小明：What are you going to eat? 小花：I will eat rice and Kung Pao Chicken. 小明：I also want to eat Kung Pao Chicken, let’s go together.
